hazards.name: Time Flux & Rifts
description: Drain health, stamina & mana. The flux are the lesser versions that are blue vortexs near to the floor. The rifts are the greater variations that extend much higher into the air and are more deadly. Negate time is useful if a number of these appear at once.

hazards.name: Bleeding Sands of Time
description: Applies a bleed effect to the player. This can stack up to lethal ranges quickly. If you are in the Warding Parry stance and have someone to heal you then you can destroy it by double clicking it like other destructibles. A Mend rune is helpeful as well.

hazards.name: Miasma
description: Applies a disease effect to the player. This can stack up to lethal ranges quickly. Completely avoid this if possible.
